short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Provided tab and tab group keyboard utilitiy shortcuts and auto hide unfocused tab groups.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Features:
1. Default anonymous group.
2. Open new tabs in the current group.
3. Hide inactive groups  automatically.
4. Keyboard actions for moving tabs/tabgroups.
